https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bhhRJUdIfT3ZeOS2X4gLfeKLSCa.jpg Chang-ho, 12, becomes friend with a North-Korean immigrant about the same age who just crossed the Dooman river, border between North-Korea and China. His mute sister and his wise grand-father will get along with him in a series of misfortunes. Dooman River
